title: Backyard Brawl kicks off Week 1
description:
Wendi Nix, Sam Acho, and David Pollack get you ready for Thursday's week 1 matchups including the restart of the Backyard Brawl rivalry, the Big Ten opener for Penn State and Purdue, and the season kickoff for the Tennessee Volunteers as they enter Josh Heupel's 2nd year as head coach. Plus, Andrea Adelson joins the show live from Pitt and Adam Rittenberg joins live from State College, PA.
